title: 服务器关掉之后就开不起来了(问题刚才自己搞好了。谁能告诉我原因)
author: wysquan
txt_content:
本帖最后由 wysquan 于 2014-4-1 23:50 编辑 

什么都不会。就自己看了下教程。让后开了个服务器。
晚上跟朋友玩的时候都还是正常的。关掉之后就开不起来了。
研究出来是什么情况了。是因为我在软件界面上把IP也填上去了。
删掉就好。这个软件貌似不要在设置里面加IP都能联机

[GUI] 正在回复你的Bukkit版本...
[GUI] 你现在的Bukkit版本是 1.7.2-R0 (#3020)
[GUI] 启动Bukkit服务器 - 最小RAM:1016 最大RAM:1024
[GUI] 服务器启动中...
[GUI] 服务器启动...
0:59:06 Loading libraries, please wait...
0:59:09 ,023 WARN Unable to instantiate org.fusesource.jansi.WindowsAnsiOutputStream
0:59:10 [00:59:10 INFO]: Starting minecraft server version 1.7.2
0:59:10 [00:59:10 INFO]: Loading properties
0:59:10 [00:59:10 INFO]: Default game type: SURVIVAL
0:59:10 [00:59:10 INFO]: Generating keypair
0:59:10 [00:59:10 INFO]: Starting Minecraft server on xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx:25564  （这里原来是默认的额那个端口的。但是后来发现不行就改了）
0:59:10 [00:59:10 WARN]: **** FAILED TO BIND TO PORT!
0:59:10 [00:59:10 WARN]: The exception was: java.net.BindException: Cannot assign requested address: bind
0:59:10 [00:59:10 WARN]: Perhaps a server is already running on that port?


点了重启之后
[GUI] Restarting the server...
[GUI] 服务器关闭中...
1:04:10 [01:04:10 ERROR]: Encountered an unexpected exception
1:04:10 java.lang.NullPointerException
1:04:10 at net.minecraft.server.v1_7_R1.DedicatedServer.aw(DedicatedServer.java:282) ~[craftbukkit.jar:git-Bukkit-1.7.2-R0.3-b3020jnks]
1:04:10 at net.minecraft.server.v1_7_R1.DedicatedServer.a(DedicatedServer.java:228) ~[craftbukkit.jar:git-Bukkit-1.7.2-R0.3-b3020jnks]
1:04:10 at net.minecraft.server.v1_7_R1.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:465) [craftbukkit.jar:git-Bukkit-1.7.2-R0.3-b3020jnks]
1:04:10 at net.minecraft.server.v1_7_R1.ThreadServerApplication.run(SourceFile:617) [craftbukkit.jar:git-Bukkit-1.7.2-R0.3-b3020jnks]
1:04:10 [01:04:10 ERROR]: This crash report has been saved to: E:\1.7.2服务器\.\crash-reports\crash-2014-03-29_01.04.10-server.txt

下面上路径上的那个TXT文本的内容
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// I just don't know what went wrong :(

Time: 3/29/14 1:04 AM
Description: Exception in server tick loop

java.lang.NullPointerException: Exception in server tick loop
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_7_R1.DedicatedServer.aw(DedicatedServer.java:282)
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_7_R1.DedicatedServer.a(DedicatedServer.java:228)
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_7_R1.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:465)
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_7_R1.ThreadServerApplication.run(SourceFile:617)


A detailed walkthrough of the error, its code path and all known details is as follows:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-- System Details --
Details:
        Minecraft Version: 1.7.2
        Operating System: Windows 7 (amd64) version 6.1
        Java Version: 1.7.0_51, Oracle Corporation
        Java VM Version: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (mixed mode), Oracle Corporation
        Memory: 823624096 bytes (785 MB) / 1021837312 bytes (974 MB) up to 1021837312 bytes (974 MB)
        JVM Flags: 2 total; -Xms1016M -Xmx1024M
        AABB Pool Size: 0 (0 bytes; 0 MB) allocated, 0 (0 bytes; 0 MB) used
        IntCache: cache: 0, tcache: 0, allocated: 0, tallocated: 0
        CraftBukkit Information: 
   Running: 
   Failed to handle CraftCrashReport:
java.lang.NullPointerException
        at org.bukkit.Bukkit.getName(Bukkit.java:74)
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_7_R1.CraftCrashReport.call(CraftCrashReport.java:20)
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_7_R1.CrashReportSystemDetails.a(SourceFile:74)
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_7_R1.CrashReport.h(CrashReport.java:45)
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_7_R1.CrashReport.<init>(CrashReport.java:33)

        at net.minecraft.server.v1_7_R1.ThreadServerApplication.run(SourceFile:617)

        Profiler Position: N/A (disabled)
        Is Modded: ~~ERROR~~ NullPointerException: null
        Type: Dedicated Server (map_server.txt)


说什么也都看不懂。。。求解决啊。我是用  BUKKITGUI V1.6.4.410开的

replies.author: 锐星
replies.txt_content: 第一个是端口错误，服务器已经运行在那个端口。

replies.author: 超神的Gao
replies.txt_content:
输入stop正常关闭服务器
        去server.properties的white-list=把true改成false

或者重新启动电脑
